main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDimDI] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:42:15 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblDimDI]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblDimDI]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDimDI] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:42:15 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblDimDI]( [DimDIID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [Name] varchar(50) NOT NULL, [Description] varchar(255) NULL CONSTRAINT [PK_tblDimDI] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimDIID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 70) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
